name: Disktroyers
description:
Disktroyers is a classic arcade local-multiplayer sport game inspired by windjammers but with a futuristic style like tron.

Currently it only has 1 small map to play, but if we continue developing it in the future we may add different maps, more players, etc.

As the demo/prototype it is, the player is the standard character from Unreal Engine with our own created textures.

The UI has some "bugs" as the images have a high resolution and needs some time to render. This will be changed if we resume the development improving also de UI in general.

TIPS/INFO:

  • The UI of the game works using the mouse. You can navigate the UI by clicking on the buttons.
  • To play the match, you need a PS4 and/or XBOX controller. If you use a PS4 controller, you might need to map the inputs with other software like DS4Windows (for example). As a local-multiplayer game you will need 2 controllers to play, there is no single player mode by the moment.
  • During a match, you can open the pause menu by pressing ESC key in the keyboard

Hope you like it!!!
